messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

windows updates not available sent tuesday re action required cryptographic prevention hi have client site for several months have logged into have performed action below features dialogue should appear scroll down find file sharing make check next left unchecked then click have also tried get updates working but every try fails telling there was problem checking for updates history shows last update was december you know how can get updates working tried connection well think issue with client preventing cheers analysis
